channel.title: Should I release my new server?
channel.description: I am running a PkIsle source of my server. Its name is DragonGuild. You may have known the user on these forums, his name is also DragonGuild but he is trying to ruin my server for years. I finally ip banned him off of my commputer and server. I was wondering maybe its time to quit. I know you will all leech because its the famous legendary PkIsle V1 source but maybe it had to be that way. Vote now so I can decide. Be honest and dont say yes because its pkisle. Please post if you vote. Thanks.

item.title: Should I release my new server?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

I don’t think you should. No-one will appreciate it, they’ll just change the name maybe move a few npcs around and release it as a new source. That’s what happens here.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I release my new server?

item.title: Should I release my new server?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

MasterHelper:

I am running a PkIsle source of my server. Its name is DragonGuild. You may have known the user on these forums, his name is also DragonGuild but he is trying to ruin my server for years. I finally ip banned him off of my commputer and server. I was wondering maybe its time to quit. I know you will all leech because its the famous legendary PkIsle V1 source but maybe it had to be that way. Vote now so I can decide. Be honest and dont say yes because its pkisle. Please post if you vote. Thanks.

Nothing is famous or legendary so don’t say it is +
Don’t,if you do make it un-editable to annoy leechers.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I release my new server?
item.dc:creator: @Keasho Keasho
item.description:
@Keasho wrote:

it depends if you want to deal with all the inmature players…
And the people asking you if they can have mod ALL the time

And release the sources… only if u dont mind if people take credit for your
source, because pretty much they will.

Read full topic
